00022 #include "Common/Compat.h"

00030 using namespace Hypertable;
00031 using namespace Serialization;
00032 
00033 namespace {
00034   const uint32_t DFS_BUFFER_SIZE = -1;  // use dfs defaults
00035   const uint32_t DFS_NUM_REPLICAS = -1; // ditto
00036   const int64_t DFS_BLOCK_SIZE = -1;   // ditto
00037   const size_t ML_ENTRY_BUFFER_RESERVE = ML_ENTRY_HEADER_SIZE + 512;
00038   const size_t DFS_XFER_SIZE = 32768;
00039 } // local namespace
00040 
00041 MetaLogDfsBase::MetaLogDfsBase(Filesystem *fs, const String &path) :
00042   m_newfile(true), m_fs(fs), m_path(path) {
00043   if (fs) {
00044     if (fs->exists(path)) {
00045       String tmp_path = path + ".tmp";
00046       int tmp_fd;
00047       size_t toread, nread, nwritten;
00048       uint8_t *buf = 0;
00049       try {
00050         m_fs->rename(path, tmp_path);
00051         tmp_fd = m_fs->open(tmp_path);
00052         m_fd = m_fs->create(path, false, DFS_BUFFER_SIZE, DFS_NUM_REPLICAS,
00053                             DFS_BLOCK_SIZE);
00054         toread = nread = DFS_XFER_SIZE;
00055         while (nread == DFS_XFER_SIZE) {
00056           buf = new uint8_t [ DFS_XFER_SIZE ];
00057           nread = m_fs->read(tmp_fd, buf, DFS_XFER_SIZE);
00058           if (nread > 0) {
00059             StaticBuffer sbuf(buf, nread);
00060             nwritten = m_fs->append(m_fd, sbuf, 0);
00061             if (nwritten != nread) {
00062               delete buf;
00063               buf = 0;
00064               HT_THROW(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "problem making copying of metalog");
00065             }
00066           }
00067 
00068           m_newfile = false;
00069         }
00070         buf = 0;
00071         m_fs->close(tmp_fd);
00072         m_fs->remove(tmp_path);
00073       }
00074       catch (Exception &e) {
00075         delete [] buf;
00076         HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Error opening metalog: %s", path.c_str());
00077       }
00078     }
00079     else 
00080       m_fd = create(path);
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 int
00085 MetaLogDfsBase::create(const String &path, bool overwrite) {
00086   return m_fs->create(path, overwrite, DFS_BUFFER_SIZE, DFS_NUM_REPLICAS,
00087                       DFS_BLOCK_SIZE);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void
00091 MetaLogDfsBase::close() {
00092   try {
00093     m_fs->close(m_fd);
00094   }
00095   catch (Exception &e) {
00096     HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Error closing metalog: %s", m_path.c_str());
00097   }
00098 }
00099 
00100 void
00101 MetaLogDfsBase::write(MetaLogEntry *entry) {
00102   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00103   m_buf.reserve(ML_ENTRY_BUFFER_RESERVE);
00104   m_buf.ptr += ML_ENTRY_HEADER_SIZE;    // reserve header space
00105   entry->write(m_buf);                  // serialize entry to buffer
00106   // fill out the entry header
00107   uint8_t *p = m_buf.base + 4;          // reserver 32-bit checksum space
00108   encode_i64(&p, entry->timestamp);
00109   *p++ = entry->get_type();
00110   size_t payload_size = m_buf.fill() - ML_ENTRY_HEADER_SIZE;
00111   encode_i32(&p, payload_size);
00112   p = m_buf.base;
00113   uint32_t checksum = crc32(m_buf.base + 4, m_buf.fill() - 4);
00114   encode_i32(&p, checksum);
00115   // write to the dfs
00116   write_unlocked(m_buf);
00117   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"checksum="<< checksum <<" timestamp="<< entry->timestamp
00118       <<" type="<< entry->get_type() <<" payload="<< payload_size << HT_END;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void
00122 MetaLogDfsBase::write_unlocked(DynamicBuffer &buf) {
00123   StaticBuffer sbuf(buf);
00124   m_fs->append(m_fd, sbuf, Filesystem::O_FLUSH);
00125 }
